cookieBanner.title: We respect your privacy
cookieBanner.text: This website uses cookies. Some of them are technically necessary for the operation of our content management system. In addition, we use the tracking program 'Matomo' for statistical analysis of website usage and to optimize our homepage. Matomo stores the information anonymized, in accordance with data protection law and temporarily only on our server. Further information can be found in the {privacyLink}.

error.title: An error has occurred!
error.tryAgain: To edit your form input, please just close this browser window. The form is still open in the background.
error.emailFormat: Unfortunately, we could not add your email address to our subscriber list because the format of the address is not correct - perhaps the {'@'} sign is missing. Please enter your e-mail address again.
error.emailExists: Your email address is already in the recipient group.
error.emailBlocked: Your e-mail is blocked.\n This happens, for example, if your email address is on a blacklist. Please use another e-mail address.
error.requiredFields: One or more mandatory fields were not filled in.
